The Rogues are thrown back by the light, but quickly regroup, the 
femmes r=
eturning to robot mode.  "Keep an eye on them," Riekan 
informs his compani=
ons, 'them' meaning the Tripreds and Predacons.

The shark-bot walks over t=
o Prometheus.  "How about it, stranger?  
Would you follow those who rule o=
ur homeworld with an iron fist?"  He 
indicates the Tripredacus warriors.  =
"Would you align yourself with 
thieves who care only for conquest?"  He po=
ints out the 
Predacons.  "Or would you prefer to associate with the Rogues=
 and 
Maximals, who have the best interests of Cybertron and the galaxy in =

mind?"

Diplomacy is not Riekan's strong suit, but he knows how to be 
per=
suasive when the time comes.
